title: For trade: t206 tolstoi, Cycle, American Beauty
author: tonyo

posts.post_title: For trade: t206 tolstoi, Cycle, American Beauty
posts.post_content:
Anyone interested in trading for any of these three?

I'd like to pick up different t206 tolstoi, epdg, cycle or AB for the Krause
different cycle or AB for the Clark, different AB for the Donovan.  

Cycle 460 or AB 460 would be wonderful.  

Similar condition please.  Doesn't need to be graded.

I'd also consider multiple t206's with back stamp or handwriting or other interesting marks front or back.

Thanks!
